email-body:
Dear customer,
as a guarantee of our continuous commitment to providing the best solutions in terms of IT security, we are attaching the monthly report relating to your system which has been monitored through the Firewall device.
Our IT security team has conducted a In-depth analysis of the data collected and extracted key metrics that highlight the performance and security of your system over the last month.
In the document you will find the complete report of all relevant metrics and details. We suggest that you examine it carefully and highlight particular areas of interest or concern, our team will be at your complete disposal.
We always thank you for the trust you place in us, and send you our best regards.

IBS s.r.l.
